title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.3 - Scope and application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.3 - Scope and application

State Regulations

This rule shall apply to all employers whose most recent
annual payroll is in excess of $800,000 and whose most recent experience rating
exceeds the level of 1.2. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
59-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
